segments.text: There are so many potential problems converging in this room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most immediate risk is that stool, ready to topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is in a very precarious position, reaching so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then thereâ€™s the water, spreading silently across the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is absolutely going to slip on that slick surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman herself is already standing right in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't imagine how she hasn't felt the water through her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of a falling child or a crashing plate would surely get her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could all escalate into quite a disastrous moment very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope no one gets hurt from this chain of events.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The consequences of spilled water and a tipping stool are not minor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes, a bruised child, water damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me quite uneasy to watch these hazards unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple moment could turn so messy and upsetting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for chaos here is surprisingly high.
segments.speaker: PAR
